text: Gish is the first album of the alternative rock group The Smashing Pumpkins. It was released on May 28, 1991. == Track listing== #I Am One 4:08 #Siva 4:22 #Rhinocerous 6:33 #Bury Me 4:50 #Crush 3:31 #Suffer 5:11 #Snail 5:11 #Tristessa 3:30 #Window Paine 5:55 #Daydream 1:56 #I'm Going Crazy (hidden song) 1:01 Category:1991 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Rock albums Category:The Smashing Pumpkins
title: Gish
